The correct answer is A: A close-up of the coconut resting on the bright yellow slide with the text “Momentum is zero” visible.
In the video, the narrator mentions that the coconut at the top has zero momentum. To demonstrate this concept, a close-up shot of the coconut resting on the slide is shown, along with the text "Momentum is zero" written on the slide. This helps viewers understand that the coconut is stationary and has no motion. The other options do not accurately represent the visual being discussed in relation to momentum.
The on-screen text that appears is: "Momentum = mass x velocity". This is option A.
